titleproper.value:
Guide to the Civil War Collection
                    <lb/> 1838-1880
                    <lb/>
                    <num>MS 670.14</num>

author.value: Finding aid prepared by Susan Kriete. Machine readable finding aid created by Susan Kriete.

creation.value:
This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit
                <date>2014-04-16T11:16-0400</date>

abstract.label: Abstract
abstract.value:
The Civil War Collection is an "artificial" collection of materials of unrelated provenance that have been organized together by subject matter. It includes correspondence, military and official documents, legal papers, bills and receipts, personal narratives, soldier biographies, and documents relating to slaves. Although primarily Union side, there is one folder of Confederate documents, as well as several folders of material relating to post-war memorials and publications. The materials in this collection have been digitized and are available online to on-site researchers and to users affiliated with subscribing institutions via 
                <extref ns2:href="http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&db=h5c&bquery=(HJ+57C1)+OR+(HJ+58BM)+OR+(HJ+58H2)+OR+(HJ+58Q2)+OR+(HJ+5GO9)+OR+(HJ+5HAM)+OR+(HJ+5HMT)+OR+(HJ+5W67)+OR+(HJ+603E)+OR+(HJ+6ETK)+OR+(HJ+6HNS)+OR+(HJ+6HPT)+OR+(HJ+6HSO)+OR+(HJ+6I11)+OR+(HJ+6I3H)+OR+(HJ+6IKP)+OR+(HJ+6K12)+OR+(HJ+6KS4)+OR+(HJ+6KSG)+OR+(HJ+6KX6)+OR+(HJ+FBK4)+OR+(HJ+FBK5)&type=1&site=ehost-live">EBSCOhost</extref>.

p.value: Items that include presidential signatures will be presented to researchers in duplicate form.
This collection should be cited as the Civil War Collection, MS 670.14, The New-York Historical Society.

Other post-war materials include personal reminiscences, documents relating to Civil War memorials, and biographical sketches of soldiers solicited by Frank Moore for his 
                <emph render="italic">Rebellion Record</emph>. Also included are several 19th century catalogs of Civil War-related material.

subject.value: United States. Army--Ordnance and ordnance stores.
